page.title: 14Recreation
page.content: Cumnor Cricket Club has its own field, pavilion and plays throughout the summer. Cumnor Minors Fotball Club fields several teams of junior players. It plays at the Closes, Appleton Road (Public Recreation Ground). Cumnoe Old-Time and Modern Sequence Dance Club meets weekly at Cumnor village hall. Cumnor Youth Club meets weekly at the Old School for various energetic activities. There is a sailing club which uses Farmoor Reservoir. Fishing is also available at the reservoir and on the river Thames.
